title: Software Developer
full_description: Software Developer 920715 We are a leading electronics measurement company looking for an experienced, part-time C#/Visual Studio software developer. We offer the most precise electronic measurement tools in the industry, with advanced software to match. Our employees leverage their insight and passion to revolutionize electronic measurement and make a difference in the world. If you want to work for a family-oriented company that makes positive impacts to the electronic measurement community, we invite you to join this culture.Pay and Benefits:Hourly pay: $65/hrWorksite: Leading electronics measurement company, RemoteW2 Employment, Group Medical, Dental, Vision 401k, PSLQualifications: Experience as a C#/Visual Studio software developerPrevious experience with Test Automation Platform (TAP) is highly desiredStrong customer facing skillsShift: Monday-FridayJob Type: 20 hours/week, 1 month assignment
